name: Bronze Nagato Side Table
description: The Nagato stool, blending functionality with sculpture, was originally crafted by Liaigre in 1986 from solid oak, named after a Japanese town and inspired by Constantin Brancusi's 'Endless column'. A bronze edition with a dark patina and textured wood finish was later created as a limited edition of 75 pieces, exclusively available at 77 Faubourg Saint Honor√©.
